original_title: 制服美少女4本番 希島あいり
overview: Set in school, 4 magical productions depicting the swaying maiden heart of the transcendent beautiful girl "Airi"! 4 stories of excitement based on the real love bana of "Airi" himself! The appearance of four "Airi" writhing in four situations is just a moment of bliss! !!
title: Beautiful Young Girl in Uniform 4 Airi Kijima
